# PKEraserTool.EraserType.vector

**Case**

An eraser that removes an entire drawn line.

## Declaration

```swift
case vector
```

## Discussion

When a vector eraser touches any portion of a drawn line, it removes the entire line.

## Eraser types

- **PKEraserTool.EraserType.bitmap**: An eraser that removes only those portions of the drawing it touches.
- **PKEraserTool.EraserType.fixedWidthBitmap**
